revelsMD.revels_tools.conversion_factors module

Unit conversion utilities for RevelsMD.

This module provides physical constants and simple conversion helpers used to translate between different molecular dynamics unit systems.

Notes

  • The function generate_boltzmann() supports several common unit systems corresponding to LAMMPS and MDAnalysis conventions.

  • Uses values from scipy.constants.

revelsMD.revels_tools.conversion_factors.generate_boltzmann(units)

Return the Boltzmann constant in the specified unit system.

Parameters

unitsstr

The desired unit system. Supported values are:

  • 'lj' : Lennard-Jones reduced units (returns 1.0)

  • 'real' : kcal·mol⁻¹·K⁻¹ (LAMMPS real units)

  • 'metal' : eV·K⁻¹ (LAMMPS metal units)

  • 'mda' : kJ·mol⁻¹·K⁻¹ (MDAnalysis units)

Returns

float

Boltzmann constant in the requested unit system.

Raises

ValueError

If the provided unit system is not recognized.

Examples

>>> from revelsMD.revels_tools.conversion_factors import generate_boltzmann
>>> generate_boltzmann('metal')
8.617333262145e-05
>>> generate_boltzmann('lj')
1.0
Parameters:

units (str)

Return type:

float
